infos.value: Winning the battle for Supremacy will allow you to obtain untold renown and spoils of war.

• Limited Guild Battle Supremacy •
League Battles will be held in the same format as Limited Guild Battles.

• League Battles •
Leagues will be divided based on Limited Guild Battle rankings, then all-play-all battles will be held within each League.

• Participation Requirements •
The Guild has 10 or more members, and the Guild Leader has logged in within the last three days.

Lastly, the Guild participated in the previous Limited Guild Battle.
Meeting all three of these requirements will automatically enter the Guild into Guild Battle Supremacy.

• Battles •
You can use actions to Attack your enemy or Support allies and hinder foes.

• Formations •
There may be formation restrictions, so be sure to organize your formations in accordance with these restrictions.

• League Lists •
Once participants have been divided into Leagues, tap the "League List" button to check the battle outcomes of your opponent or others within your League.

• Ranking •
Rankings are determined by Battle Points earned during League Battles.
Proceed to a tutorial on Limited Guild Battles?
